ghosts.name: poltergeist
ghosts.description: Can throw multiple objects at once. Weakness is empty rooms

ghosts.name: banshee
ghosts.description: Targets one player at a time (that is terrifying). Weakness is the crucifix

ghosts.name: Jinn
ghosts.description: The further you are away, the faster a Jinn is. Its weakness is turning off a location’s power source

ghosts.name: spirit
ghosts.description: Most common type of ghost. Its weakness is using smudge sticks to prevent attacks

ghosts.name: wraith
ghosts.description: Footsteps cannot be traced. Its weakness is salt

ghosts.name: phantom
ghosts.description: Looking at a phantom will cause your sanity to drop. Its weakness is taking its photo will cause it to disappear

ghosts.name: mare
ghosts.description: Increased attacks in the dark. Its weakness is light

ghosts.name: revenant
ghosts.description: Fast when hunting. Its weakness is that its slow when you are hidden

ghosts.name: shade
ghosts.description: Hard to find. Its weakness is that a shade won’t hunt if players are in groups

ghosts.name: demon
ghosts.description: Will attack aggressively. Its weakness is that asking a question on a ouija board won’t lower a player’s sanity

ghosts.name: yurei
ghosts.description: Affects player sanity more than normal. Its weakness is using a smudge stick to prevent it from moving

ghosts.name: oni
ghosts.description: Can move objects quickly. Its weakness is that its active when more players are nearby
